name: Verify search for an item GRID view
fullName: Verify search functionality: Verify search for an item GRID view

steps.name: Given  user navigates to home page
And  he is on home page
When  he search for a product with name 'shirt'
Then  he should see the title 'Search results for: \'shirt\''
And  he should see the following products:

labels.value: Verify search for an item GRID view
